tool_description: Calibrates frequency measurement and counting functions using precision frequency references, testing gate time accuracy, resolution, and frequency range limits.

frequency_ranges.description: Frequency ranges to test in Hz

signal_amplitude.description: Test signal amplitude in volts RMS

gate_times.description: Gate times to test in seconds

error_messages: Frequency reference unstable: Reference frequency source shows instability affecting calibration accuracy.
Input sensitivity insufficient: DUT requires higher signal amplitude for reliable frequency measurement.
Gate time error: DUT gate timing circuit shows significant timing errors.
Frequency resolution limit: Test frequency approaches DUT resolution limits.
Input overload: Signal amplitude too high, causing input circuit overload.
Trigger level instability: DUT trigger circuits not functioning reliably with test signals.
Reference frequency accuracy: Reference frequency source accuracy insufficient for required calibration.
usage: Define frequency ranges and test frequencies. Optionally adjust signal amplitude and gate times. Tool applies precision frequency signals and evaluates DUT frequency measurement accuracy.

frequency_errors.description: Frequency measurement errors in parts per million

sensitivity_threshold.description: Minimum signal amplitude for reliable frequency measurement
